example.parse: (TOP (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG أَسْئِلَة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL المُذِيعِين))) (VP (IV3FS+IV تَتَطَلَّب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL إِجابات)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (DET+NOUN الضُيُوف)))) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV تُوقِد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN النار)) (NP-ADV (ADJ_COMP أَكْثَر) (CONJ وَ) (ADJ_COMP أَكْثَر)))))))))
